on reading compounds: 阿蘭陀【オランダ】Holland, The Netherlands
お亀【オカメ】homely woman (esp. one with a small low nose, high flat forehead, and bulging cheeks), plain woman, soba in soup with slices of boiled fish paste, shiitake mushrooms, greens, seaweed, etc.
kun reading compounds: 阿る【おもねる】to flatter, to play up to, to fawn on, to pander to, to cater to
隈【くま】corner, nook, recess, shadow, shade, dark circles (e.g. around one's eyes)
